metadata.title: Maddmax Car Art 1965-69 Corvair Convertible Redline Design Hoodie Sweatshirt
features: Corvair Printed Sweatshirt: perfect combination of style and functionality, this Corvair sweatshirt is a soft, heavy weight cottonpoly fleece that everyone will enjoy. Also take a look at our other Corvair t shirts, Corvair hoodies and Corvair hats.
This is a traditional style long sleeve fleece sweatshirt with the Corvair design on the front printed in the USA

Heavy weight cotton fabric of this sweatshirt makes it very comfortable. The breathable fabric keeps you dry, warm and fresh. Made of 50/50 cottonpoly, this unisex sweatshirt is extremely comfortable.
This casual unisex fleece sweatshirt will be the one you go to and will make a great gift idea for yourself or your loved ones!
description: Corvair Sweatshirt is a perfect combination of style and functionality. This Corvair is a soft, heavy weight cottonpoly fleece Sweatshirt that everyone will enjoy . Also take a look at our other Corvair t shirts, Corvair hoodies and Corvair hats.
